message: Let's start with a fair split that recognizes time's value. This gives us both a good deal.
Your turn to feel the time pressure, Alice.  I'll take the same deal, but reversed.
Okay, Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm willing to compromise a bit, but time is ticking for both of us.
The clock is ticking, Alice. I'm mirroring your offer - time to get serious!
Alright Bob, let's stop this back and forth.  A perfectly even split is the fairest and avoids us both losing everything.
